translations: n.河豚；吹捧者；喷气的人；抬价者

sentences.sentence: The only reef-associated examples are belonids, siganids, and possibly some canthigasterin puffers .
sentences.translation: 珊瑚礁鱼的例子是鹤鱵，蓝子鱼，与可能地一些扁背鲀。

sentences.sentence: Any of various poisonous fish related to the puffers that are used as food, especially in Japan, after the poisonous skin and organs have been removed.
sentences.translation: 任何一种与做食物用的河豚有关的有毒鱼类。尤指日本河豚鱼。此类鱼除去有毒皮肤与内脏后可以食用。

sentences.sentence: There is also an interest in sea horses, puffers, clown fish and other salty types with shapes more strange and colors brighter than even the showiest of. fresh-water fish.
sentences.translation: 甚至某些人对海马、海豚、小丑鱼，以及其它比绚丽的淡水鱼外形更加奇特、颜色更加耀眼的海水鱼特别感兴趣。
